item.description:
This docu[mentary] presents its story via multiple access points: the subject of autism, the notion of alternative healing and the simple travelogue appeal of an excursion to remote, untamed Mongolia. Pic[ture] has the nerve to be spiritual without entering the minefield of faith, and through careful handling, could resonate strongly with spirtatule aud[ience]s aware of th healing arts of long ago.
Trailer: <xobject width="470" height="264"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/cYkT_GndKtE&hl=en_US&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="470" height="264" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
item.name: Yoga, Sharmantic, and acient healing art practitioners suggested - The Horse Boy
